# ğ€ğ¥ğ¢ğœğ âœ˜ ğŒğ®ğ¬ğ¢ğœ

[ğ€ğ¥ğ¢ğœğ âœ˜ ğŒğ®ğ¬ğ¢ğœ](https://github.com/NITISHSHARMA143123/AliceXmusic) is a Powerful Telegram Music+Video Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls by which you can stream songs, video and even live streams in your group calls via various sources.


* Youtube, Soundcloud, Apple Music, Spotify, Resso, Live Streams and Telegram Audios & Videos support.
* Written from scratch, making it stable and less crashes with attractive thumbnails.
* Loop, Seek, Shuffle, Specific Skip, Playlists etc support
* Multi-Language support
